articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: An order to pause Mudra Dharana in Datti Temple premises
articles.description: There is very old saying - 'dont invest all at one place'. As they would become bottleneck in future. Most of the temples grew rapidly & came under Govt Radar as great source of money. Today that growth has become bottleneck, though temple money no more useful to any social problems of community as resourcey, rather benefitting others, and now rituals also have becomes target. Big Madhwa centers like Udupi, Mantralaya etc are great targets. Take your action now...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Sadhakaru - Sri Anant Kulkarni
articles.description: Bagalkot been a hub for large number of madhwa families decades ago and today as well. Banashankari of Badami is one of the most visited places for madhwas in Bagalkot as family deity. The Dasa Sahitya and Vyasa Sahitya both are part of this soil since several centuries. To justify this one can remember Sri Prasanna Venkata Dasaru who is most popular from this region. Haridasa sahitya work has taken a lots of contributions from Bagalkot region to enrich Vishnu Tatwa among common people. Anant Kulkarni started singing at 1977 itself, and later secured B.A. in Sangeeth Shastra. Later he was also honored as A grade singer in Akashvani, Prayag Sangeeth Association provided 'Sangeeth Marthand' titles. His popularity begin from Uttara Karnataka as the tones he used for popular songs were born out of the Uttara Karnataka style. Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Certification course on Trikala Sandhyavandna(Coimbatore)
articles.description: Registration Last date: 30-Oct-2022. Trikala Sandhyavandna is the requirement of any Dwija/Upaneeta men. In today busy life trikala sandhyavandana has more advanced benefits than before. As per medical science one need to relax or break from contineous work every 8 hours daily. Hence, even most of the office working hours also is around 8-9 hours. Here is an effort from Coimbatore team in teaching Sandhyavandna along with its meaning and also provide you certifications. Register here...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Madhwa Sadhakaru - Bheemacharya Vadavi(Maaruteesh Vitthal dasa)
articles.description: One should also know the Guru of such great people. Their Guru was Sri Subbaray Dasa. Yatha Guru tatha Shishya as the saying goes Sri Bheemacharya got interest in Hari-Dasa sahitya(the sahitya that brings wealth of Veda Jnana to common man in Kannada Language). Hence, they put effort in study, analysis and right interpretations of hari-dasa sahitya too. This work gave outcomes like Kanakadas Charitra, Giriyammana charitra, Sri Raghavendra Kathamruta, Sripadaraj Charitra kavyas. With such a devotion and knowledge that they got through Hari-Dasa sahitya they even got inspired to become a Dasa(one who always worships lord Vishnu is called as Daasa, spreading true knowledge of Vishnu is main work of Dasaru). Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Madhwa youth online Madhwa Talent show launches 1st show
articles.description: We often like youth come forward for Dharma, learn Madhwa tatwas. But, we lack in providing platforms in great events like Aaradhana, Festivals, Utsavas to show case their knowledge, share knowledge or at least engage them to learn Madhwa Tatwas. While large number of volunteers offer their full day services but only restricted to serving food or managing queue or lifting heavy items. Rather volunteers need to focus on engaging youth, kids, girls to have large number of interactive sessions to learn Madhwa tatwas. Madhwa Youth with Satkarta, Sarvadarshi is launching facebook participation platform on 15th October. Read more...

articles.author: Anil Harihar
articles.title: The most useful madhwa tatwas that is needed for common human being today.
articles.description: Please watch the video to understand the great thoughts of Madhwa Tatwas. The effort is been made by a small kid of 11 years old. The beauty of madhwa tatwa is that, it is applicable to all times of the universe, to all human beings and its most nature friendly thought process. Apart from that Madhwa tatwa is Hari Tatwa and can take us to Moksha sadhana even in this kaliyuga. Please watch the video...

articles.author: Anil Harihar
articles.title: Our todays eating habits are earning lots of sins, want to know how?
articles.description: Food wastage is a sin because! It will create demand and supply issues. A city needs 1000 kilogram vegetables daily means 1000 kilogram vegetables need to be grown daily. If the land does not help in such growth the farmer would go for hybrid or fast-growing crops. Today our increased demand for milk has made cows be injected with hormones to yield more milk. We moved out of Indian cows and used the milk of jersey cows. Please watch the video...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Understand hidden leadership from front results
articles.description: Editor Special: Leadership is something that is not visible directly. But, its correct or wrong applications are always visible through end results of the organization. One can easily make out, is the leadership strong or weak by just observing the work style of end worker. This is how usually customer satisfaction and disatisfaction comes. While management waste time in root causing customer feedbacks by questioning the support engineer. But leadership has made this result which is easy to understand... watch more...

articles.title: What is aaradhana of GOD?
articles.description: Submitting what is given by GOD

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Why Madhwa Samaja looks the way how it is today?
articles.description: Editor Special: In the past, Brahmins had many acres of farms lands, they were doing dharma sadhana, leading peaceful life with earning comes from farms. They were not in hurry to win over others, rather they could spend more time on sadhana. The land reformation act grabbed most of the lands from Brahmins. This made many brahims poor. Later invaders attacks made brahmins to loose remaining lands and assets and thus most brahmins becoming poor and poor. These instances lead them into fear of life. Distracted them away from sadhana marg. Made them to chase assets and property.

Interested and eligible candidates can apply online for the vacancies via the website kvsangathan.nic.in after the notification is released. Read more from the More button...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi health bytes - 6 Interesting Makhana Benefits
articles.description: Though its not used much in madhwa families as food item but here are some benefits it provides to the body. Makhana is a type of seed derived from the Euryale ferox plant. They are also sometimes referred to as fox nuts or lotus seeds. Makhanas are widely cultivated throughout Asia and often used in traditional forms of medicine to treat various conditions (1Trusted Source). They are also sometimes roasted and enjoyed as a savory snack or added to curries, side dishes, or desserts.

Kindly spread the positive news in your circle and make some one study with the help of scholarship. Also, you need to guide students of madhwa community to go for scholarship, govt schemes and also educate them to be dharmik to get scholarships from various matha and associations like Satkarta available for madhwas only. articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Adopt Go-shala through Government Portal on this Krishna Janmastami.
articles.description: Krishna was so well known as Gopala. The one who does Palana(protection & maintenance) of Go(cow) is Gopala. At this Krishna Janmastami why dont we do something unique to pray to Lord Krishna? Yes, Govt has created an opportunity to adopt a Cow/Go-shala through your possible donation capacity. The government portal provides information on all registered Go-shalas across Karnataka and India. Here you can choose the Go-shala that is close to your heart and donate. Manoratha Goshala of Badami is close to the people's hearts because they are protecting 57+ cows which should have gone to Kasayi Khana if not attended.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: What is speciality of Manoratha Goshala of Badami to Adopt Govt Portal on this Krishna Janmastami?
articles.description: Govt has created an opportunity to adopt a Cow/Go-shala through your possible donation capacity. Here you can choose the Go-shala that is close to your heart and donate. Manoratha Goshala of Badami is close to the people's hearts because they are protecting 57+ cows which should have gone to Kasayi Khana if not attended. The owners of this Go-shala are Gosevakaru themselves(Go means Jnana and Go means Cow) so they are Sudha Pandits and taking care of cows. Make this Janmastami special for your family by doing such great donations but cutting other expenses.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Madhwa Sadhakaru - Smt Godhutai Kulkarni
articles.description: But, this is where Godhutai story comes to the notice. While family and kids grew further its Godhutai who kept the flag hoisted on 15th August 1947 safe and in same sanctity. During those days even a family lady having great responsibilities of home making and educating kids and taking care of family, she was still focused on keeping flag safe and also reminding family to hoist it every year. Though she was not literate but having great Dharma and Desha Bhakti is still an inspiration to the young women of today. She had 12 kids and she took care of Flag as if its her 13th kid!!!

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: A potentially rocky world, larger than Earth
articles.description: Ross 508 b is a super Earth exoplanet that orbits an M-type star. Its mass is 4 Earths, it takes 10.8 days to complete one orbit of its star, and is 0.05366 AU from its star. Its discovery was announced in 2022. Its orbit takes it in, and out, of its star's habitable zone. Such a planet may be able to retain water on its surface, and will be an important target for future observations to study the possibility of life around low-mass stars like the M dwarf it orbits. Red dwarfs, which constitute three-quarters of the stars in our galaxy and exist in large numbers in the vicinity of our solar system, are excellent targets to find exoplanets in our neighborhood.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: What happened to carpooling business (QuickRide) during Covid-19?
articles.description: Innovation, building business and sustaining it and then making profit are parts of Business lifestyle. All business run under lots of external factors to be successful or failure or pause for some time. Carpooling was best concept for cities like Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai where people book bike, car through trusted process and reach destination with best price. The rides are not costly to partners and also becomes cheap to owner of the car. Read more details from Deccan Herald article about situation of such wonderful concept during Covid-19 impacts...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Do you know health benefits of Pooja items?
articles.description: Young generation is confused with incubation of negative thoughts about culture and dharma. While smart young asks 100 of questions when it comes to following any dharmik stuffs but do not question things like 'why cake to be cut on birthday'? 'why parents need to wear white dress during birthday' etc. But that is not the discussion here. We have wonderful research data and findings about health benefits of each and every item that we use during pooja. The special ones are Shankha, Shaligram, Sudharshana and copper items. Let us see what are benefits of Shankha here to begin, watch the video...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: The meaningless marriages!
articles.description: Only photographer, cook & barber person who comes for makeup are most respected people in the marriage today. There is no respect or place for elders, ancestors, pandits who make the marriages. People open up big mouth to ask question 'Hey how much pandit will take money?' Photo shoot, having makeup persons & barbers, junk foods introduction, dance, singing, firing crackers, even spending of those 2-3 days of marriage is like film style copy. Fully adharmik & costly - building social peer pressure.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Life Bytes(Video): The story of trust in GOD
articles.description: God blessed Ajaamila, Gora Kumbara, Gopalakas - he blesses and protects even dumb animals as they all are true believers of GOD. We human beings are becoming too smart and we dont believe anyone and even GOD. That is the most powerful background of all our miserable situations. We feel that unless i have great job i cannot survive happily while lots of low income people are more happy that rich. We procure lots of medicines thinking what if tomorrow we get disease? But poor believes as long as GOD keeps me up and live i will survive and if he calls will leave this body - he is the one who really is Jnani.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Bytes(Video): These questions can make your daughter's life
articles.description: The role of parents is been impacted by social status-based lifestyle. Parents are not happy if their kids are educated or working to their strengths and being true children to them. Rather they want their children to be like everyone other in society. This has increased the human race towards material life. Here is how today's mothers talk to their daughters. Watch our video by clicking More button...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Life Bytes: Indian Startup Layoff 11,360+ Employees Laid Off In 2022
articles.description: Most of our Madhwa marriages are now dependent on few things like Salary, Good company name, groom working only in metro cieies only etc. Specially social pressure creating the marriage to happen on these grounds than finding good/capable life partner. The universal truth is - nice things come with a cost and nothing is free in this world. The high paid jobs are often lead to streesed work life, non-growing families(not getting blessed with kids) & risk of layoff. Parents need to care about the job stability, fair enough pay and not too sky hyped asks. Firstly, being a grounded life style to enjoy life thank going behind social peer pressure. Read more in app...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: What is self transformation?
articles.description: You might wonder what exactly is meant by self-refinement, self-transformation and self-development and how to practice them? To achieve this one will have to adopt four disciplines. These are Self-restraint (sanyam), Self-study (swadhayaya), Spiritual practice (Upasana/Sadhana) and Social service(seva). These are like four essential steps in the upliftment of human life, four cornerstones of the edifice of an accomplished life and four resources of human ascent.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Why do we get big diseases?
articles.description: The past karmas will come as diseases as per shastras. 'पूर्वजन्म कृतं पापं व्याधि रूपेण पीड़ति' and as per English dictionary definition diseases are 'a disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant, especially one that has a known cause and a distinctive group of symptoms, signs, or anatomical changes'. In science/technology world we override ourselves as supreme/Freedom to get out of any issues but karma will never vanish unless you use it. Postponement of small diseases causes as big one in janmantara as accumulated karma phala...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: The Growth & Pause of Madhwa Mathas in 20th century
articles.description: The Matha & Yatis or Matha devotees who focused on कालोयमीर श्रुतशास्त्र विचार हीनः हिनोच्छ्रायः  ग्रसित शाधुगुणोदयश्च, तस्मात् त्वामध्य मरुतात्मजदिव्यशास्त्र व्याख्यानमेव सततं कुरुमात्यजेति principles of following Madhwacharya tatwas are winners today in 2022. These mathas have attracted talent, young & moving people more into Sadhana Margas. Also, the Yatis have come as clear winners in adopting society into Madhwa siddhantha peacefully. While few who focused on development, association with wrong priorities are clear loosers. But all introspect then the madhwa community becomre much more strong in 2023 or coming years...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Why we do laborious work?
articles.description: Most of our struggle, non-rewarding jobs and also stress all are attributed to Karma that we escaped wisely(that is how we think). These karmas will not vanish just by themselves if you have not consumed rather you are forced to enjoy it( both good and bad karmas). We avoid helping parents, we avoid helping inlaws, we avoid considering husband as pati-devatha in modern world, we avoid giving birth just to manage our beauty. So finally where it reaches? Watch the video...

articles.title: The story of Dolo-650 outsales since covid-19
articles.description: Income Tax (IT) sleuths conducted simultaneous raids on Bengaluru-based pharma major Micro Labs Ltd. Micro Labs’s major product Dolo 650 made big business during the COVID-19 pandemic and the company emerged as the leader in the sector. Reports suggest the firm sold 350 crore Dolo 650 tablets since the outbreak of the pandemic in 2020. Providing Gift to doctors and pharma are major investments under 1000 Crore branding acts

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Rama – He is Satyakama, how can kaama trouble Him?
articles.description: सर्वत्र सर्वानपि सर्वदापि प्राप्नोति कामान् ननु सत्यकामः  In the previous verse we saw Valmiki Ramayana mention that Rama is not affected by any of the defects like anger, envy etc. In the next few verses, we will see why the six enemies, and other defects, do not have any effect on Rama. This is based on Sangraha Ramayana of Narayana Panditacharya. The six enemies – kaama (lust), krodha (anger), mada (pride/intoxication), lobha (greed), moha (illusion), maatsarya (envy).

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Tapta Mudra Dharana Program 2022
articles.description: Pratham Ekadashi(known as Ashadha Ekadashi) is remembered for keeping ourselves pure internally and externally to devote rest of the year in GOD services. It is been recommended to take Tapta Mudra from their Gurus who are Sanyasis. Today we wear tatoos of sports, film persons as symbol of our respect towards them. While the whole our life runs with directions of Lord vishnu and finally he is our soul maker. Hence, wearing the Shankha-Chakra the symbols of Lord Vishnu is atmost important. Mudra is mentioned in Veda, Ayurveda & vishnu Rahasya as well...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: International yoga Day - a thought from Madhva Siddhantha
articles.description: Religious life manifests itself in the triple form of Conduct, Doctrine, and Devotion. We have to serve God by deporting ourselves as His humble servants, by subordinating our will to the Divine will, and by ceaseless service rendered unto Him and unto His Bhaktas. We have to serve and glorify God by studying and realising- the truths of Veda, by believing in a system of holy doctrines, by a firm grasp of Sri Madhva's philosophy in respect to God, Soul, and Nature. We have to serve God by means of devotion, by turning sublime love unto Him.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: [Video Blog] How Yoga solves most of your body & mind problems?
articles.description: Citta vritti is a term that refers to the thoughts that clutter the mind. The name comes from the Sanskrit, citta, meaning 'consciousness' or 'memory,' and vritti, meaning 'waves.' It can be translated in English to mean 'mind chatter,' and is sometimes called 'monkey mind.' One of the goals of yoga is to take control of citta vritti by quieting the mind, thereby reducing stress and increasing Self-awareness. Watch the video...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Know the significance of offering Archana in temples
articles.description: The purpose of Archana is to thank god for giving us all what we need for survival – be it the strength to endure agony or the basic essentials. It is indeed a thanksgiving gesture that cultivates the habit of sharing and caring. The Prasad offered to the deity is distributed among people and thus the fruits of prayers reach the needy too

articles.author: Madhavarao

Here is an opportunity for people in and around Dharwad, Hubli to use platform provided - contact 9902761790 for more information.

articles.description: Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai said spirituality and science should go hand in hand as there is a need to create a knowledge repository. articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Editor Speaks - The framework that builds best characterstics in kids
articles.description: While as a smart parent we want to give our kids great example and references we should know how references are to be given? What type of references normally work and does not work. If you give reference of brother, relative, sister or school mate(who is scoring more marks or good at school) it is called as near reference. If you give reference of a CEO, pandit or saints or Pralhada or Harischandra its called as far reference.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Dasa Sahitya Lahari Sri Krishnadas Murugod Dasaru
articles.description: Sri Krishna Das Murgod is fairly well known by everyone in North (Uttara), Karnataka. They spread hari-das Sahitya by visiting house after house with out demand of any benefits. Their true service to GOD was to spread Madhwa Tatwa hidden in the Das Sahitya.  Murgod Dasaru has knocked the house after house, & Performed Bhajana as per our Dwaita Philosophy-Taaratamya-Panchabheda. His voice & continuous spell of full taratamya list of songs is not possible to be copied by anyone else. All the Padas-Songs -Sulaadis of Dasa are all in his mouth, sings by heart.  We feel as though he has crammed up all these great Literary works.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Listen the power of Sudhama at the peak of poverty
articles.description: Another interpretation sees Sudama's meeting Lord Krishna and his coming back home to a better life as an allegory of the process of meditation: Urged by the mind, the intellect goes to and identifies with the inner Self, which refreshes and rejuvenates on all levels and awakens the memory of the Vedas. After returning to the relative, the intellect finds that all experiences are glorified.

Facebook has invested a lot to identify its backdoor entry to business opportunities always, if you look sexy then soon you may be online source for lots of bad activities in the world!!!

If we don't invest ourselves into the growth of Madhwa kshetras(not just renovating, again and again, existing ones but building new ones) then we can be sure that we lost such nature-friendly heavenly places.

In 2022 Sri Jagannath Dasaru movie was the best breakthrough...

Sumedhachar Kallapur and their gurus Pt. Pavamanachar & Pt. Anandachar (maybe a few more gurus) shishya-guru have made a record which was witnessed by 2000+ audience physically present and 10000+ audience virtually present in live streaming. Read more...

Pumpkin comes with lots of benefits and few of them are good sleep & great benefit to thinking/memory power. Specially growing kids would benefit. Most temple, matha teerth-prasada provides large amount of pumpkin serving as part of food. Thus teerth-prasad not only cleans sins but also boosts health. Check the benefits now...

articles.author: Bharath Sharma
articles.title: Forgetting Isn't Bad, It's Actually A Form Of Learning Say Scientists
articles.description: Our memories and retention capabilities have been tremendously changed over the course of the last decade - with ease of digital memory provided by smartphones and other devices. If you find yourself forgetting details here and there, you're not the only one. And now scientists believe it may actually be associated with a process that aids learning.

When we draw this parallel to our Janma to become part of the universe, where are the work ethics? What are these ethics called as? who is the supreme to write these work ethics? who really is our caring supreme to write work ethics so that we live along with non-living beings in most beneficial ways? Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: A make up can go away when washed - so why are we fooling ourselves?
articles.description: One cannot simply adopt the life style of others. The given life span is not enough to copy and execute it in same way. Thus either western into sanatan or sanatan into western lifestyle change will be half coocked, and leading to diseased gratification in life. This is the wonderful weakness that we develop as an individual and then weaken our community so that others can ride us and destroy faster. Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Raward for goodness, though Goodness comes purely from high ability of the SOUL
articles.description: Reach out to 9110626140. Last date 28-Feb-2022. Here is the great opportunity for rewarding people who are really following Madhwa Dharma in 2022 year. When a great extent of families turned themselves into western lifestyle still you find wonderful families that follow Dharma at most possible. There is opportunity to nominate such 5 category fitment Madhwas for rewards like 1. Nachiketa 2. Aakashraja 3. Sudhama 4. Saraswathi Purandharadasa 5. Kunthi and Pralhad awards...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Sadhakaru - Sri Anant Kulkarni
articles.description: Bagalkot been a hub for large number of madhwa families decades ago and today as well. Banashankari of Badami is one of the most visited places for madhwas in Bagalkot as family deity. The Dasa Sahitya and Vyasa Sahitya both are part of this soil since several centuries. To justify this one can remember Sri Prasanna Venkata Dasaru who is most popular from this region. Haridasa sahitya work has taken a lots of contributions from Bagalkot region to enrich Vishnu Tatwa among common people. Anant Kulkarni started singing at 1977 itself, and later secured B.A. in Sangeeth Shastra. Later he was also honored as A grade singer in Akashvani, Prayag Sangeeth Association provided 'Sangeeth Marthand' titles. His popularity begin from Uttara Karnataka as the tones he used for popular songs were born out of the Uttara Karnataka style. Read more...

articles.author: Sheshamoorthy Awadhani
articles.title: Madhwa Sadhakaru - Sri Ramacharya H Awadhani
articles.description: Sri Ramacharya Awadhani of Mannur is known for extreme reading hunger of shastras. Their sadhana does not stop at just reading, it covers a great Brahmacharya, covers life long giving up on material life, donation of all assets to relatives and temples, full day time spending in sadhana, paatha, pravachan. At the old age as well around 90 doing strict Chaturmasa, Ekadashi, visiting Aaradhana. He is living library of many Madhwa memories.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Madhwa Sadhakaru - Sri Sreenivasacharya Gurachar Katti
articles.description: As we know RSS is the unique group which comes when there is flood, national issue and also natural disaster times. In 1994 when there was an issue to hoist flag in Idga Ground(ಈದ್ಗಾ ಮೈದಾನ) there was a work going on from RSS lead by Murali Manohar Joshi, Uma bharathi and many others and Sri Sreenivasachar Katti were one among them. While there was fight with Govt itself (Which was not allowing to hoist flag in the interest of Idga Ground groups), they hoisted flag that year and also in the gun-fires attained Haripada as Veera Yodha.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Madhwa Yogi Nimbal Sri Hayagreevacharya
articles.description: Sri Hayagreevacharya is one among most popular scholars of 19th century in & around Bijapur. Having lost eyes but still having all shastra, purana, stotra, tarka, nyaya at tip of the toung can explain their vairagya shakti, jnanayogyate and tapas. Today the name of such a small village Nimbal if its popular at world level then this is only due to such great saint like mahayogis. They ran Jnana Dasoha, Anna Dasoha and also vidya poshana of large number of students for free. One can visit Sri Vitthala Mandir at Nimbal till today. Their satkarma hinted them time and date of their soul departure. Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Madhwa Sadhakaru - Smt Godhutai Kulkarni
articles.description: But, this is where Godhutai story comes to the notice. While family and kids grew further its Godhutai who kept the flag hoisted on 15th August 1947 safe and in same sanctity. During those days even a family lady having great responsibilities of home making and educating kids and taking care of family, she was still focused on keeping flag safe and also reminding family to hoist it every year. Though she was not literate but having great Dharma and Desha Bhakti is still an inspiration to the young women of today. She had 12 kids and she took care of Flag as if its her 13th kid!!!

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarvadarshi Madhwa Sadhakaru - Bheemacharya Vadavi(Maaruteesh Vitthal dasa)
articles.description: One should also know the Guru of such great people. Their Guru was Sri Subbaray Dasa. Yatha Guru tatha Shishya as the saying goes Sri Bheemacharya got interest in Hari-Dasa sahitya(the sahitya that brings wealth of Veda Jnana to common man in Kannada Language). Hence, they put effort in study, analysis and right interpretations of hari-dasa sahitya too. This work gave outcomes like Kanakadas Charitra, Giriyammana charitra, Sri Raghavendra Kathamruta, Sripadaraj Charitra kavyas. With such a devotion and knowledge that they got through Hari-Dasa sahitya they even got inspired to become a Dasa(one who always worships lord Vishnu is called as Daasa, spreading true knowledge of Vishnu is main work of Dasaru). Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sri Anjaneya Swamy Temple is Hanuman temple located at Chowluru,Andhra Pradesh
articles.description: Janamejaya Hanuman and Sri Vyasaraj Pratistita hanuman have great significance. However, being nearest to the place like Santebidanoor where there is also a Janamejaya Pratistan Sri Anjaneya temple and saints like Sri Satyavara, Sri Satyaparayana teerthas would have surely visited and worshiped this Hanuman which would give more sannidhana of Jeevottama Vayudevaru. Read more...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Sarva Papa Nivaraka Mannur Chenna Keshava
articles.description: Mannur is a village in Kalaburagi district. Its just 100kms from Kalaburagi and reachable by roads. One can reach Mannur from Vijayapura, Solapura as well easily. This place has become more divine due to Dhruva Karachita Lord Chenna Keshav. Sri Chenna Keshava is aradhya deva of families like Jahagirdar, Aadya. Sri Dhruva Maharaja has worshipped the Vasudeva moorthi as prescribed by Maharshi Narada. Later this Vasudeva moorthy was worshipped by Agastya maharshi. The Vasudeva moorthy was found below sandbed in middle of river Bheema. Sri Vidhyanidhi teertharu of Uttaradimath, installed this moorthy.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Unique hanuman temple of Halagani Hanuman
articles.description: Halaganesh(Mukhya pranadevaru) temple hold history of around 4000+ years. Mukhyaprana Devara moorthy has 3 avataras represented very nicely and unique ways. Said to be discovered by Janamejaya Maharaja while digging operation through 'HALA/negilu'. At the head you will find shikhe - representing acharya MADHWA, face towards south - representing HANUMA, while legs are turned to north(opposite direction of face) representing another avatara BHEEMA. This temple is located just near to the main road itself, thus making it easy for travellers to visit during Vijayapura visits. Many local people daily come and worship 3 times to Mukhya Prana. From Vijayapura this is just 28km distance and with good road connections.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Ibrahimpur Vijayapurua Swayam Udbhava - Venkataraman
articles.description: Just near to entry of Vijayapura from Bangalore to Solapur national highway, there is a beautiful Swayam Udbhava Lord Sri Venkatesh temple. It is having around 100+ years of history. It is said to be that during Bijapur shahi's time when the place was planned to construct a tomb the construction workers found lord Venkatesh status which is in just right tilted style. During Navaratra lots of Madhwa girls, boys and families do padayatra for almost 5kms to reach the place from their homes. Sri Venkatesh has been blessing the Vijayapura people from the south side and while Torave Narasimha blesses people from the north-west side.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: What kind of hair you have? Have you heard about it?
articles.description: Kapha hair (smooth and shiny), oil them once/twice with a hair oil with sesame base. Pitta hair (oily scalp and white hair), oil them twice with coconut or ghee hair oil base. Vata hair (dry, thin, frizzy and split ends), oil them twice with almond, sesame and castor hair oil base. How to take care of your hair lets read some great tips from Ayurveda here...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: 6 Interesting Makhana Benefits
articles.description: Though its not used much in madhwa families as food item but here are some benefits it provides to the body. Makhana is a type of seed derived from the Euryale ferox plant. They’re also sometimes referred to as fox nuts or lotus seeds. Makhanas are widely cultivated throughout Asia and often used in traditional forms of medicine to treat various conditions (1Trusted Source). They’re also sometimes roasted and enjoyed as a savory snack or added to curries, side dishes, or desserts.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Ash Gourd for your health
articles.description: This green vegetable has been well-regarded for its significant medicinal values since ancient times and is widely documented in Ayurvedic texts. Today, it continues to be heralded for its immense health benefits and is widely incorporated, in popular local cuisine across India, as well as in alleviating illnesses of the stomach, liver and skin, to name a few.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: योग: चित्तवृत्ति निरोध:  - for healthy world
articles.description: Most health issues stem out of our mind that generates all signals to the body. The so called compititive environment that we live it, causes a great depressions even though body does not produce quick symptoms. These all situations make mind produce negative energy and spread to the body causing lots of health issues. Yoga as said rightly - योग: चित्तवृत्ति निरोध:  the Yoga has power to reduce one of the Vritti called Chitta Vritti. Thus helping one to live happily and healthy.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Problem vs. Solution Mindset
articles.description: The are two ways of thinking. Predominantly we have people who are Problem Mindset thinking. Such people even gather several times comes with no solution. They keep on adding problems to the list and feel great. While Solution Mindset people think differently and even you have one such person you get solution to problem. Most of our discussions, community thoughts end up with no conclusion or result because people are just problem mindset thinkers. Such people have energy but cant get value. Just if they learn how to convert to Solution mindset can add lots of value to community. Learn more through us.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Want to know how to put your kids into good culture?
articles.description: Most parents have trouble in knowing formula to keep their kids culturally rich. It is parents responsiblity to pass on rich culture of madhwas to generation by generations. This an art, and also have to be really well attended through formula. Please watch this video to know the formula to get your kids into good culture sooner.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Satkarta Donation Project 53
articles.description: Thanks to all donors of Project - 52, with 91 donors we got around 25000/- and donated to needy for the payment of hospital bills and other medical expense requirements. The needy Madhwa family members have done really great working during covid-19 lockdown, so through Satkarta God has provided them this help. All Satkarta Seva Association members wished the family to achieve more Madhwa Sadhana. Our small donations should help their family to achieve extra mile in Madhwa sadhana. Also we request Madhwas to come forward and do your small donation of Rs 101/- for Satkarta Projects.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Satkarta Donation Project 52 [ Completed ]
articles.description: Thanks to all donors of Project - 52, with 91 donors we got around 25000/- and donated to needy for the payment of hospital bills and other medical expense requirements. The needy Madhwa family members have done really great working during covid-19 lockdown, so through Satkarta God has provided them this help. All Satkarta Seva Association members wished the family to achieve more Madhwa Sadhana. Our small donations should help their family to achieve extra mile in Madhwa sadhana. Also we request Madhwas to come forward and do your small donation of Rs 101/- for Satkarta Projects.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Atmashrama gearing up for 1st Sudha Mangala in the year 2023
articles.description: Atmashrama over the years has been doing yeomen service to our community by conducting various online/offline courses and Jnana Karyas. They have launched many courses for learning Veda, Spoken Sanskrit, Grammar and Sudhanta Vedanta. Around 400 students are currently enrolled and immensely benefitting from our courses. Atmashrama runs from donations, so its important for society to support such schools thank other spendings from future perspectives.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Our tie up is with Satkarta Seva Association for crowd funding
articles.description: Satkarta(since 2015) is a section 8 company, under companies act of India. This has more transperant process in fund collection from donors and donating it to the needy Madhwa. The established process for verification, updates, audit and also management of funds helps donors satisfaction for their donation. Satkarta encourage people to donate in small but in large number of people so that it will help needy to get help but not become burden on donors.

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Satkarta Education donation project[completed]
articles.description: Thanks to all donors with 51 donors we got around 35000/- and donated to needy for the admission of his younder son, Chi Samrudh. Parents are really happy for Madhwa community standing with them during difficult situations. The son is going to get admission to AIRD education school in Bangalore(being near to home as small kid). This should help their family to achieve extra mile in Madhwa sadhana, help kid to not just get laukik education but also Madhwa tatwa...

articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Satkarta Medical donation project 51[completed]
articles.description: Thanks to all donors with 31 donors we got around 25000/- and donated to needy for the payment of hospital bills and other medical emergency requirements. The needy Madhwa attained Hari Pada on 17th May 2022. All Satkarta Seva Association members prayed for Sadgathi of the soul and also prayed for getting next Madhwa Janma with much Sadhana abilities. Our small donations should help their family to achieve extra mile in Madhwa sadhana. Also we request Madhwas to come forward and do your small donation of Rs 101/- for Satkarta Projects.

articles.description: Atmashrama over the years has been doing yeomen service to our community by conducting various online/offline courses and Jnana Karyas. They have launched many courses for learning Veda, Spoken Sanskrit, Grammar and Sudhanta Vedanta. Around 400 students are currently enrolled and immensely benefitting from our courses. articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.title: Ekadashi
